mutants.code:
def count_subarrays_in_range(arr, L, R):
    n = len(arr)
    (fp, lp) = (0, 0)
    ans = 1
    prev = 0
    while lp < n:
        if L <= arr[lp] <= R:
            prev = lp - fp + 1
        elif arr[lp] > R:
            prev = 0
            fp = lp + 1
        lp += 1
        ans += prev
    return ans
